title: Normal Draft Pick?
body: Will we ever get normal draft picks? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Need to remove blind pick and swap with normal draft imo
I would prefer draft over blind any day
Yeah I prefer normal draft picks cause say for example I choose Bard support in blind pick and I later find out they have Blitzcranck support ^^.
The answer to your question is no.
